gold.user: Admin user requesting a list of all IP address aggregates.
gold.ideal: A JSON array containing all aggregates with their details.

gold.user: Network engineer creating a new IP address aggregate.
gold.ideal: A JSON object confirming the creation of the aggregate with its ID.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving details of a specific aggregate by ID.
gold.ideal: A JSON object containing the details of the specified aggregate.

gold.user: Network engineer updating an existing IP address aggregate.
gold.ideal: A JSON object confirming the update of the aggregate.

gold.user: Admin user deleting an IP address aggregate.
gold.ideal: A JSON object confirming the deletion of the aggregate.

gold.user: Network administrator listing all ASN ranges.
gold.ideal: A JSON array containing all ASN ranges with their details.

gold.user: Network engineer checking available ASNs for a specific range.
gold.ideal: A JSON array of available ASNs for the specified range.

gold.user: Network engineer creating a new IP address entry.
gold.ideal: A JSON object confirming the creation of the IP address with its ID.

gold.user: Admin user partially updating an IP address entry.
gold.ideal: A JSON object confirming the partial update of the IP address.

gold.user: Network administrator deleting an IP address entry.
gold.ideal: A JSON object confirming the deletion of the IP address.

gold.user: Network engineer retrieving a list of all VLANs.
gold.ideal: A JSON array containing all VLANs with their details.

gold.user: Admin user updating a specific VLAN's details.
gold.ideal: A JSON object confirming the update of the VLAN.

gold.user: Network engineer creating a new VRF.
gold.ideal: A JSON object confirming the creation of the VRF with its ID.
A JSON object confirming the deletion of the VRF.
